Title: Requires businesses which provide for someone to spoof a telephone number to keep certain records
Summary: Requires businesses which provide for someone to spoof a telephone number to keep records of the phone calls placed with their services.
LawCode: Add ยง399-rr, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring businesses which provide for someone to spoof a telephone number to keep certain records
